agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Transportation TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, February 27, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Robert Nichols The Senate Transportation Committee will consider and adopt the Committee rules, and conduct any other organizational business deemed necessary by the Chair. The Committee will hear invited testimony from the Texas Department of Transportation, the Texas Department of Motor Vehicles, and the Texas Department of Public Safety.
